version_description:
Added more review options:
- Sort by SRS level (novice then apprentice, etc.) or Wanikani level (current level radicals first, then kanji, etc.)
- Back-to-back mode: display the reading and meaning together.
- Reveal answer automatically.
- Added a button to open information about the last item you answered.

Minor features:
- Haptic feedback (small vibration) when you get an answer right.
- Disable the submit button until you type an answer.
- Turn the answer red when it's incorrect.

Bug fixes:
- Fix a bug where you would see lots of lessons from higher levels.
- Fix a bug where the top of the screen would be covered in blue bars after scrolling.
- Replace 'n' with 'ん' properly.
- Replace '-' (hyphen) with 'ー' (full-width hyphen).
- Fix the size of some radicals in search results.

- Include context sentences and a "used in" list in the Kanji details view.
- Add a "Show all" button that shows all Kanji in each level, grouped by your progress.

Minor features:
- During a review, warn if you wrote the Kanji reading for a Vocabulary (e.g. the question was 子 and you typed し instead of こ).
- During a review, warn if you got the Okurigana wrong (e.g. the question was 入れる and you typed いれろ instead of いれる).
- You can now go back by swiping on the whole screen - not just the left edge.
- Show an animation when you level up to Apprentice.
- Add "Your Response" / 「答え」 hint text.
- Add a "Try again later" option.
- Sort lessons by level first.
- Now available on iOS 10 and above.

Bug fixes:
- Fix a sync issue where a review would appear as done in the app, but still be available on the WaniKani website.
- Fix strange pie chart sizes when going back to the main screen after a review.
- Updated to better Radical images.
- Handle 'n' followed by 'm' properly.
- Convert 'n' to 「ん」 after answering a question incorrectly.
- Fix the cursor colour in the search bar.
- Fix the mis-sized blue header on the main screen on iPhone 8.
- You can now search for Kanji entered by a Japanese keyboard.

- Added Visually Similar Kanji
- Added a Katakana input mode (use caps)
- Fix a date parsing bug that caused incorrect number of reviews and start date to be shown
- Update to work with the new WaniKani API

- Fixed a crash on startup with the new WaniKani content update.
- Add audio for all vocabulary. Options to play automatically and to download for offline use.
- Correctly handle keyboard resizing.
- Fix text colour of some words in hints.
- Fix a bug where some users could see Kanji from higher levels.

* Fixed a crash when you have a cached pending review for a radical that was deleted. This most commonly crashed when swiping through levels in the "View all" screen.
* Fixed an empty blue radical review screen.
* Fixed the position of the keyboard in lesson reviews.
* Fixed a rare bug that kept data from the old user when logging out and switching accounts.
* Allow the text in context sentences to be copied to the clipboard.
* Added "Part of Speech" display.

- Fix a bug where completed reviews would sometimes be lost
- Add review notifications (thanks André Arko)
- Add a random font option for reviews (thanks hesch)
- Add a setting to hide old mnemonics from radicals (thanks Christoph Nakazawa)
- Add a quick settings side menu to the review screen
- Fix a bug where the review counts on the app icon and the main screen wouldn't refresh
- Make "Ask again later" put the item back at the very end of the queue
- Fix "mark as correct" behaviour when answering a question a second time
- Fix a small animation glitch when the labels would be replaced with "..." for a short time
Fix a crash when opening certain Kanji

- Fix an API key error on login.
- Better keyboard support for iPads (thanks André Arko)
- Increase the font size on iPads (thanks André Arko)

Fixed major bugs where review and lession progress would stop being uploaded after some time.

New features:
- Added an option to use Katakana for Onyomi readings.
- Added remaining level time and SRS level counts to the main screen.
- Added new items and pronounciation audio files from Wanikani.
- Added some new lesson customization settings.
- Added a "lowest level first" review sort option.
- Added a count of how many Kanji the user knows to the main screen.
- Added more keyboard shortcuts.

Bug fixes:
- Fix a bug where fonts would be chosen that couldn't render certain characters.
- Fix a bug with music ducking when playing pronunciation audio.
- Use Japanese fonts even when the iOS system language is Chinese.

- Fixed a major bug where review progress was not uploaded after upgrading to a new version of the app.
- Fixed a bug where it was not possible to answer reviews containing long-dashes (ー).

New features:
- Highlight Kanji in context sentences.
- Add an option for an SRS level indicator in reviews.

Bug fixes:
- Hopefully fix a crash on iOS 13 when swiping back from a subject details view.
- Blacklisted meanings are now marked as incorrect.
- Keyboard shortcut improvements.
- UI fixes for iOS 13.
- Convert n-space to ン instead of ん in Katakana mode.
- Correctly calculate level up times for 90% of Kanji.
- Use the system font for the Part of Speech label.
This version fixes an issue with dark mode on iOS 13.

- Fix a bug that allowed submitting empty answers.
- Add a font-size selector.
- Fix a bug where incorrect readings wouldn't be highlighted on the review summary screen.
- Always show Kanji hints - not just during lessons.
- Add a tiny animation to the SRS level dots.

New features:
* iOS Dark mode support
* WaniKani vacation mode support
* You can now force refresh by pulling down on the main screen
* Add an option to automatically switch to a Japanese keyboard
* Add an option to show all readings for Kanji
* Add options for newest & oldest available sort
* Show the time until the next review for the current level

Bug fixes:
* Don't randomize fonts during lessons
* Hide success rate percentage in lessons

New features:
* iOS Dark mode support
* WaniKani vacation mode support
* You can now force refresh by pulling down on the main screen
* Add an option to automatically switch to a Japanese keyboard
* Add an option to show all readings for Kanji
* Add options for newest & oldest available sort
* Show the time until the next review for the current level

Bug fixes:
* Don't randomize fonts during lessons
* Hide success rate percentage in lessons
* Fixed a crash on startup for some users

New features:
* Add a dark mode toggle.
* Add limited Siri shortcut support.
* Blur the English text in context sentences until you tap them.
* Show user-created notes for items.
* Add a Descending SRS Stage review sort option
* Add a review batch size option.

Bug fixes:
* Fix a bug where reviews for the same items would keep re-appearing.
* Add some missing titles for settings pages.
* Fix a bug where reviews might be rejected if the device's clock was wrong.
* iPad: Fix font size setting issues.
* Fix a crash when starting lessons or reviews on iOS 13.4

* Fixed a bug where the "Hills" radical would keep appearing in reviews.
* Updated to the latest version of the WaniKani data.

* Fixed a crash when trying to play audio while offline.
* Added a skip button to skip a review.
* Updated to the latest version of the WaniKani data.

New features:
* Always use the latest WaniKani meanings, mnemonics and levels.
* Add an option that makes repeated incorrect answers count as multiple SRS-level penalties.

Bug fixes and cleanups:
* Allow hardware keyboard control during wrong answers.
* Allow trailing n-kana completion in Gboard Godan layout.
* Many internal changes to convert from Objective-C to Swift.
